title: Quadrober Simulator
description:
Welcome to a world where the boundary between reality and fantasy blurs! “Quadrober Simulator” offers a unique adventure in the skin of a virtual beast combining the features of a dog, fox or cat. Karate Survivor
Get into fights with scoofs.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel i5-2500k (4 core 3.3 GHz) or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 (4 core 3.1 GHz)
system_requirements.Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 4 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 560 4 GB

game_info.Genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy
